name: Pizza Tower SAGE 2019 REPAINTED
description:
This mod is a reupload of SAGE 2019 REPAINTED, led by Denchick and brought to life by 23 contributors.

Denchick was banned from itch.io for reasons that are obvious to anyone on the pizza tower discord. I don't condone his actions, but I still remember this mod fondly from when I worked on it and I feel like people should still be able to experience it.

Also, I've updated the in-game credits (sans NPC in the hub) and text file credits because both of them sucked and were lacking different people who contributed.
